To the chief Musician<S>5329</S> upon Sheminith<S>8067</S>, A Psalm<S>4210</S> of David<S>1732</S>. Help<S>3467</S>, LORD<S>3068</S>; for the godly man<S>2623</S> ceaseth<S>1584</S>; for the faithful<S>539</S> fail<S>6461</S> from among the children<S>1121</S> of men<S>120</S>. <sup>upon: or, upon the eighth</sup> <sup>Help: or, Save</sup>
They speak<S>1696</S> vanity<S>7723</S> every one<S>376</S> with his neighbour<S>7453</S>: with flattering<S>2513</S> lips<S>8193</S> and with a double<S>3820</S> heart<S>3820</S> do they speak<S>1696</S>. <sup>a double: Heb. an heart and an heart</sup>
The LORD<S>3068</S> shall cut off<S>3772</S> all flattering<S>2513</S> lips<S>8193</S>, and the tongue<S>3956</S> that speaketh<S>1696</S> proud<S>1419</S> things: <sup>proud: Heb. great</sup>
Who have said<S>559</S>, With our tongue<S>3956</S> will we prevail<S>1396</S>; our lips<S>8193</S> are our own: who is lord<S>113</S> over us? <sup>are: Heb. are with us</sup>
For the oppression<S>7701</S> of the poor<S>6041</S>, for the sighing<S>603</S> of the needy<S>34</S>, now will I arise<S>6965</S>, saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>; I will set<S>7896</S> him in safety<S>3468</S> from him that puffeth<S>6315</S> at him. <sup>puffeth: or, would ensnare him</sup>
The words<S>565</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> are pure<S>2889</S> words<S>565</S>: as silver<S>3701</S> tried<S>6884</S> in a furnace<S>5948</S> of earth<S>776</S>, purified<S>2212</S> seven times<S>7659</S>.
Thou shalt keep<S>8104</S> them, O LORD<S>3068</S>, thou shalt preserve<S>5341</S> them from this<S>2098</S> generation<S>1755</S> for ever<S>5769</S>. <sup>them from: Heb. him, etc: that is, every one of them, etc</sup>
The wicked<S>7563</S> walk<S>1980</S> on every side<S>5439</S>, when the vilest<S>2149</S> men<S>1121</S> <S>120</S> are exalted<S>7311</S>. <sup>men: Heb. of the sons of the men</sup>
